data.description: Device tree traversal using libdevinfo etc.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module abstracts from the different representations of devices
    in the Solaris OE. This includes access to libdevinfo, the
    representation below /devices and the /etc/path_to_inst.
    Applications using Solaris::DeviceTree can traverse the device tree
    in a uniform manner independent from the actual data source.
